rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer area incorporating Vastu principles by ensuring the door faces north for positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large living area with south-facing windows to invite sunlight, aligning with Vastu guidelines for warmth and positivity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficient kitchen space designed for energy-efficient cooking and storage, following Vastu by aligning it in the southeast corner.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A compact dining area adjacent to the kitchen, featuring a Vastu-compliant north-east facing seating arrangement.

rooms.name: Balcony and Garden Entrance
rooms.description: A balcony area that connects the interior with the large garden, following Vastu by offering a calming view towards the east.

rooms.name: Hallway and Corridor
rooms.description: Interior corridor connecting all rooms, designed with minimalistic Brutalist features and Vastu alignment through balanced circulation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated media room for entertainment, insulated acoustically and arranged to face the south-west direction in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing north to promote positive energy flow.
South-facing window to maximize natural light.
Window in the southeast corner for ventilation and Vastu compliance.
North-east facing window to ensure balanced energy.
Door leading to the garden, ensuring an eastward view.
Window designed to enhance acoustics and natural light, facing the southwest.

levels.notes: Design optimized for a two-story 3BHK cottage on a 30x50 feet plot. Emphasis is placed on Vastu compliance, minimalistic Brutalist aesthetics, and cost-effective construction methods. The design encourages ample natural light, ventilation, and the integration of a large garden to provide tranquility.
